---
title: "Future Goals"
---

1.  To make the world a more just and sustainable place!

2.  Focus on science communication and public engagement to get more people involved in local government decision-making.

3.  Implement more renewable energy.

4.  Ensure that sustainable choices are available to all people no matter their race or socioeconomic status.

5.  Pursue a career working at the local government level (ie. city, county, or state), or some form of utilities.

6.  Help people of all ages find a love for and connect with nature.
